rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with Art Deco motifs and elegant finishes. Vastu considerations ensure that the main door faces east.
Open-concept living area with geometric patterns and bold lines characteristic of Art Deco. Vastu: positioned in the north-east to promote prosperity.
Dining area featuring a geometric glass chandelier and elegant Art Deco detailing. Vastu placement: east to encourage health.
Modern yet stylistically Art Deco kitchen with high-end finishes. Vastu recommends south-east corner for optimal energy.
Functional servant quarters with efficient storage and ventilation. Positioned in the rear for privacy.
A private gym designed with clean lines and Art Deco accents. Vastu: west placement to harness energy.
Spacious bathroom with period-inspired fixtures and elegant Art Deco tiling.
